answers.answer: Very possible. You can get gestational diabetes which isn't good. Try to cut down as much as possible. Try making and eating fruit salad, Google fruits that aren't too high in sugar. Good luck :)

I'm the same way! I managed to get to 38 weeks and so far no diabetes :) Just make sure you drink lots of water, eats a variety of foods, and try to limit your sweets. I know it's hard but try to use the sweets as a reward after you eat some veggies or something that way you're at least intaking healthy stuff first.
if u crave sweets the try getting fruits that are very sweet like the dark red apples there very sweet

question: I have the biggest sweet tooth on this Earth. And I crave it so bad. I'm worried my baby will get diabetes or something if I eat it like I do, i can eat a whole bag of Frooties, is that possible, the diabetes.?
title: Candy-holic
